### DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE OTHER THAN ADDING/REMOVING TAGS ###

on_actions = {
	on_startup = {
		effect = {
			# Setup up a player array
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				add_to_array = { # It will automatically add the scope
					array = global.players
				}
			}

			#Set up Roman warlords tags array
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = RMR } # Rome
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = GAL } # Francia
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = OCC }
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = GYE } 
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = GAS }
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = ORL } 
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = PRS }
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = NRM }
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = CHM } 
			add_to_array = { global.roman_tags_array = WAL }
		}
	}
}
